main event: On 2 September 1952, four civilians observed an unidentified flying object described as star-like in appearance over Riverside, California.
interesting points: The object was reported as blue, red, and yellow, and was moving erratically, The observation lasted approximately 2 minutes, No identifying marks or characteristics were visible, Wind velocity and direction during the sighting remain unknown, A radar review indicated it might have been similar to an aircraft or possibly a meteor.
